data.text: Zii ɠiligiti, à maaɓuɠa lɛɛ, wo woilo!
Mazɔlɔɔ Ɠɔoɠɔ GALAGI ná-ziiɠaawanai ɠana ʋa zii ɠiligiti daalɔɠɔma.
Nii kpein é volozu geeɠɔlɔgi ɠa, ti pɛ ta ɲɛɛlɛ,
Ɠɔoɠɔ GALAGI ná-boɠa zɔkpɔi ɠula kɛlɛma geeɠɔlɔgi zu,
Ɠɔoɠɔ GALAGI ná-boɠa zɔkpɔi yiɠoa ga ɲamai,
Teɠuiti ta loo ʋɔɔma ta nikɛ zinɛiti ta nikɛ zinɛ wolaiti,
Mazɔlɔɔ toɠa ɠɛ ga potokula voloi Ɠɔoɠɔ GALAGI ʋɛ,
Edɔme yooi ma ɗɛ wolaiti ta valibo,
É ɗa ɠala folo ʋɛɛ kpidi ʋa, é la zaa,
Ná ɠa ɠɛ ga buungiti ta zɛligoiti seizuʋɛ.
Ɠaingiti ta ʋɔnɔ ná-masa pɛlɛiti bu,
Teʋebai zu zuaiti ta ɗa ɠomi ná ga zuluɓuiti,
Náʋɛ nɔ ɠa kaalii a laɠagi lo ná,
À wɛlɛ lɛɛ Ɠɔoɠɔ GALAGI ná-sɛʋɛi zu, wo kala!
Ta ɓɔɠɔi ɠa é kɛɛni ga kpakutoomai,
